# Authors & Contributors

PyGraft-gen is built and maintained by contributors from Orange SA and the open-source community.

---

## Core Team

<div class="grid cards" markdown>

-   :fontawesome-solid-user-tie: **Ovidiu Pascal**
    
    ---
    
    **Lead Developer & Maintainer**
    
    Software Engineer at Orange Innovation's DATA-AI entity, bridging research and production. Works with researchers to turn mathematical models into operational systems, specializing in Semantic Web technologies and Graph Theory.
    
    [:fontawesome-brands-github: GitHub](https://github.com/Rapture244){target="_blank" rel="noopener"} | [:material-web: Website](https://rapture244.github.io/){target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

-   :fontawesome-solid-flask: **Lionel Tailhardat**
    
    ---
    
    **Research Supervisor & Maintainer**
    
    Researcher at Orange Innovation's DATA-AI entity specializing in knowledge engineering and dependability. Co-maintains PyGraft-gen and supervised the development of its ontology extraction and real-world integration features. Brought this team together and initiated the research project that became PyGraft-gen, pushing it from concept to reality.
    
    [:fontawesome-brands-github: GitHub](https://github.com/GenEars){target="_blank" rel="noopener"} | [:material-web: Website](https://genears.github.io/){target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

-   :fontawesome-solid-lightbulb: **Nicolas Hubert**
    
    ---
    
    **Advisor & Original PyGraft Creator**
    
    Created the original [PyGraft](https://github.com/nicolas-hbt/pygraft){target="_blank" rel="noopener"} framework that PyGraft-gen builds upon. Provided guidance and insights throughout the development process. Currently works as an Applied Scientist at Zalando SE.
    
    [:fontawesome-brands-github: GitHub](https://github.com/nicolas-hbt){target="_blank" rel="noopener"} | [:material-web: Website](https://nicolas-hbt.github.io/){target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

</div>

---

## Acknowledgments

- **[Orange SA](https://opensource.orange.com/){target="_blank" rel="noopener"}** for sponsoring the development and making it possible to open-source the project
- **Nicolas Hubert** for creating the original PyGraft framework and allowing us to build upon his work
- The open-source community for feedback and contributions
